sentences: Tony Simon (born October 8, 1976), better known by his stage name Blockhead, is an American hip hop record producer and DJ from Manhattan, New York.
Simon was born and raised in Downtown Manhattan.
He is the son of the late Sidney Simon, a well-known sculptor in New York City, and Renee Adriance, a social worker.
